homeHeader.title: Plan, Launch, & Scale Your Creative Venture in Dubai Media City Free Zone with Our Expert-Led Support
homeHeader.description: Frustrated with complex documentation requirements, confusing visa regulations, or stringent KYC checks? At One Nexuz, our team of seasoned business consultants streamlines all the paperwork, fast-tracking license approvals, so you can start growing in Dubai Media City from day one! Unleash your creativity in Dubai’s #1 media hub, boasting a thriving digital landscape, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and a cutting-edge interconnected network.

leftSection_5.title: Streamline Business Setup in Dubai Media City in 5 Simple Steps

items.title: Book a Free Call
items.description: We’ll schedule the first consultation per your convenience to discuss your business goals. This will help our experts suggest the ideal business activity.

items.title: Prepare Documents
items.description: Next, we’ll assist you in gathering and preparing all the required paperwork to minimise government back-and-forth.

items.title: Secure License Approvals
items.description: We’ll submit your licensing application to the DMC Authority and pay the necessary fees. Once approved, we’ll issue it within 3-5 days.

items.title: Get Your Visa
items.description: Our expert PRO specialists will help you apply for and receive investor or employee visas to build your team and scale your business.

items.title: Open a Bank Account
items.description: Lastly, we leverage our trusted network of bank partners to expedite a corporate bank account, empowering you to simplify financial management.

leftSection_8.title: What Customers Are Saying about ^One Nexuz^
leftSection_8.description: Learn what customers are saying about One Nexuz.

items.quote: I thought setting up in Dubai would be a slow and complicated process, but One Nexuz proved me wrong. They walked me through every step, handled all the paperwork, and got my Dubai Media City license approved in just 8 days. I was able to start pitching to clients immediately.

What stood out to me was how transparent they were about costs and timelines. No hidden fees, no surprises — just clear communication and professional service. Even after setup, they helped me open my corporate bank account and hire my first two employees.

Choosing Dubai Media City was the best decision for my marketing agency, and One Nexuz made the move effortless. They knew exactly which license I needed, handled the visa process, and even introduced me to potential partners in the community. I felt supported every step of the way.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are the benefits of setting up in the DMC Free Zone?
items.answer: Creatives setting up in Dubai Media City Free Zone can benefit from the region's tax-friendly landscape, seamless immigration process, unmatched networking opportunities, and fast-growing industrial landscape.

items.question: What business structures can I choose in Dubai Media City?
items.answer: Dubai Media City Free Zone allows you to choose from four primary legal structures, including Free Zone Establishment, Free Zone Company, Branch of a Foreign Company, and Branch of a Local Company.

items.question: How many shareholders do I need to set up a Dubai Media City FZ business?
items.answer: DMC Free Zone allows you to choose from 2-50 shareholders, depending on your unique business requirements.

items.question: Do I need a local partner or agent to launch my business in DMC Free Zone?
items.answer: No, Dubai Media City Free Zone offers 100% foreign ownership, empowering you to launch, operate, and thrive in the region without the hassle of a local sponsor.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me secure a Dubai Media City Free Zone Visa?
items.answer: Yes, our PRO specialists can help you secure your desired UAE visa, from investor visas right down to golden visas.
